body:
Comment 6: 
I don't think we need to special case swap.  It's not a special case in the language, so
it doesn't need to be a special case here.  As Ian notes, you have to use a temporary
value one way or another, even for x, y = y, x.  Providing a wrapper wouldn't change
that.

The interface thing is a bug, but I see a separate issue has already been filed for that.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
